title: 急,服务端启动不了
author: 论坛好网友
txt_content:
崩溃信息：
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting minecraft server version 1.8.8
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Loading properties
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Default game type: SURVIVAL
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: This server is running CraftBukkit version git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc (MC: 1.8.8) (Implementing API version 1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT)
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Debug logging is disabled
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Server Ping Player Sample Count: 12
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Using 4 threads for Netty based IO
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Data value allowed items: 
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Generating keypair
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting Minecraft server on *:20001
[02:15:21] [Server thread/INFO]: Using default channel type
[02:15:22] [Server thread/WARN]: **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
[02:15:22] [Server thread/WARN]: The exception was: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind
[02:15:22] [Server thread/WARN]: Perhaps a server is already running on that port?
[02:15:22] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server
[02:15:22] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving players
Loading libraries，please wait
由于vps
信息如上，不常在线，管理帮忙设置最佳。谢谢。

replies.author: landequming
replies.txt_content: 应该是端口被占用了，试试换个端口或者把占这个端口的程序关了

replies.author: landequming
replies.txt_content:
landequming 发表于 2016-12-11 07:19
应该是端口被占用了，试试换个端口或者把占这个端口的程序关了
要不就是同时开了两个服务器，改一下端口就好了

上面写着
Perhaps a server is already running on that port?
是说这个服务器的端口被占用了的意思
如果你是用vps，请注销或者打开任务管理器，点进程，把java进程全部关闭就好了
